name: Snatch
effect: Reaction. Redirect the effects of one beneficial Support Move that would affect the instigating foe or one or more of their Allies/their side of the battlefield, towards the User/the User's side of the battlefield respectively (ie. The foe used Reflect, with Snatch it will now affect the User's side of the battlefield instead of the target's).
description: The user analyzes the advantages of the foe then makes them their own.
